entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then rain showers or flurries beginning early in the afternoon then changing to flurries in the afternoon and ending late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h late in the morning then northwest 40 gusting to 60. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
